item.title: The Framework Laptop 16 Can Now Be Upgraded to an RTX 5070
item.description: The Nvidia RTX 5070 is coming to the Framework Laptop 16, proving that upgradable GPUs in laptops aren’t just a fool’s errand.

item.title: Lenovo IdeaPad 5i 2-in-1 Review: Barely Squeaking By
item.description: Lenovo’s IdeaPad 5i 2-in-1 is a standard budget laptop with just enough qualities to be worth the money when it’s on sale.

item.title: Lenovo ThinkBook Plus Gen 6 Rollable Review: Like Magic
item.description: This laptop can magically expand its screen vertically by 50 percent at the touch of a button. Turns out, that’s a lot more useful than you’d expect.

item.title: Dell 14 Premium Review: Hello Old Friend
item.description: The replacement for the Dell XPS 14 has arrived, but outside of the name change, this gorgeous laptop is as divisive as ever.
